title: Phoning Home
notes: Resolutions available not displayed correctly in the configuration menu. (but selectable)

At first run I couldn't click on any main menu options with a controller or keyboard.  Once I shut everything down (thinking that it just didn't work) and came back to it a few hours later, this issue was gone.  The game mostly runs fine.  I had to turn off SSAO to get it to run somewhat smoothly.  Even after that, it suffers from intermittent "micro" stutters -- bouncing back and forth between smooth gameplay and slight stuttering.
title: Phoning Home
